Building Façades” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2386756b” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][divider line_type=”Small Line” line_alignment=”default” line_thickness=”7″ divider_color=”accent-color” custom_height=”15″ custom_line_width=”50″][vc_column_text]

Alutech Aluminium And Glass is an internationally renowned façade solutions provider with over 50 + years of experience in supporting the delivery of iconic building façades from inception through to final installation.

As one of the architectural envelope and glazing contractors from the Middle East, we specialise in the design, engineering, manufacturing, project management and installation of bespoke architectural façades worldwide.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626505599893{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-left: 30px !important;}”]“[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626277267112{margin-top: -30px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}”]

We have been perfecting the art and science of façade design, manufacture and installation for over half a century.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626506809373{margin-top: -10px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;}”]

Our mission is to lead the façade industry by innovating customized façade solutions that can achieve the highest levels of performance while being delivered on time and on budget.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

”

bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]Shaping The Future

Alutech Aluminium And Glass has been a pioneer in the façade industry with an extensive list of major past achievements. The company remains firmly focused on shaping the future of façade design.

We support environmentally friendly practices and sustainable use of resources. We are considerate in all of our relationships with clients, subcontractors and our staff.

Embedding Innovation

Innovation is embedded in every stage of our process to ensure that the resulting façade solution not only meets the needs of the present but also anticipates future environmental and performance needs.[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”20″][vc_column_text]

50 Years of experience &
expertise in façade design &
manufacture.
